alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:56PM EST until January 29 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 11 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Central Somerset County. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 11 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...An area of low pressure will bring a period of light snowfall to the region. Although snowfall amounts will be light, travel will still be impacted due to snowfall accumulations on untreated roads. Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause slippery driving conditions due to snow covered roads.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
